classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, B1, B2, B4, Upper-Division B, C1, Lower-Division C Elective, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.
